notes: Older-style apartment with dated wooden furniture, tatami room, and a bathroom showing visible grout staining and aging tiles â€” overall condition is fair but not modern. The balcony has metal railings that appear reasonably safe, but the bathtub and glass shelf in the bathroom pose baby safety concerns; the tatami room with sliding door to the balcony also needs childproofing. Natural light is decent from multiple windows and balcony access, and the 24-ping size is spacious, but the aged finishes and window-unit AC in one room suggest the unit has not been recently renovated.
